Name: Periscope
Ingredients: 15 ml Egg white (pasteurised) or 																																			Aquafaba (chickpea water)																								 or 3 dashes Fee Brothers Fee Foam cocktail foamer
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Coupe glass .
Prepare garnish of grapefruit zest twist.
SHAKE all ingredients with ice and strain back into shaker.
EXPRESS grapefruit zest twist over cocktail and use as garnish.
Review: Fabulously light, almost creamy, and floral.
History: Created by Matt Gee at Milk & Honey in New York City, USA.
Nutrition: One serving of Periscope contains 182 calories
